titles: Certaine sermons of Sainte Augustines translated out of Latyn, into Englishe, by Thomas Paynell.
author: Augustine, Saint, Bishop of Hippo.
Bernard, of Clairvaux, Saint, 1090 or 91-1153.
Paynell, Thomas.
notes: Place and name of publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Contains seventeen sermons; last sermon by St. Bernard on the Lord's Supper--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
